original_text: Because Jesus said this, the Jewish leaders became really angry. They wanted even more to kill him. Jesus not only worked on the day of rest. He was also calling God his own Father, so he was making himself equal with God.
korean_text: 유대인들이 이로 말미암아 더욱 예수를 죽이고자 하니 이는 안식일을 범할 뿐만 아니라 하나님을 자기의 친 아버지라 하여 자기를 하나님과 동등으로 삼으심이러라

sentences.original_text: the Jewish leaders became really angry
They wanted even more to kill him
Jesus not only worked on the day of rest
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 안식일에 일을 하셨을 뿐만 아니라

sentences.original_text: He was also calling God his own Father
so he was making himself equal with God
